text.div:
This value set contains 18 concepts

Expansion based on codesystem ToBeDeterminedCodes ('TbdCodes') v0.2.0 (CodeSystem)

CodeSystemDisplayDefinition
  grouperhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesgrouper

A means to bundle several observations such as one would find in a genetics test panel.

  mode-of-inheritancehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesmode-of-inheritance

This is actually LOINC code 79742-3. And the IG will be updated

  effect-transporter-functionhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codeseffect-transporter-function

Predicted phenotype for drug efficacy through transport mechanism. A single marker interpretation value known to increase or decrease the drug's performance.

  effect-medication-efficacyhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesMedication Efficacy
  effect-medication-metabolismhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesMedication Metabolism
  effect-medication-transporterhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesMedication Transporter Function
  effect-high-risk-allelehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesHigh Risk Allele
  prognostic-implicationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesPrognostic Implication component

Finding of whether a particular somatic genotype/haplotype/variation or combination-thereof predicts a particular outcome for the specified cancer - either on its own or in conjunction with one or more interventions.

  associated-cancerhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesassociated-cancer
  associated-therapyhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesGenomically linked therapy

The non-medication therapy (procedure) associated with this implication.

  region-coveragehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesregion-coverage

Given as a number between 0 and 100. Mean mapped read depth. Obtained by counting total number of mapped reads and divided by the number of bases in the region sequence.

  functional-annotationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesfunctional-annotation

Annotated changes to sequence features caused by this variant. Terms are from the sequence ontology under SO:0001537.

  exact-start-endhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesVariant exact start and end

The genomic coordinates of the exact genomic range in which the variant resides.

  inner-start-endhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesVariant inner start and end

The genomic coordinates of the inner genomic range in which the variant might reside.

  outer-start-endhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesVariant outer start and end

The genomic coordinates of the outer genomic range in which the variant might reside.

  variant-inheritancehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesVariant inheritance

A quality inhering in a variant by virtue of its origin. The terms are in the sequence ontology under SO:0001762.

  diagnostic-implicationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesDiagnostic Implication

An observation linking a genomic finding with a knowledge base, providing context that may aid in diagnosing a patient with a particular phenotype or condition.

  therapeutic-implicationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/tbd-codesTherapeutic Implication

An observation linking a genomic finding with a knowledge base, providing potential evidence of an interaction with a specified medication or non-medicinal therapy.
